Math Class

Almost compatible with JavaScript's Math class.

Implemented methods:
abs (Get absolute value)
acos (Arc cosine)
asin (Arc sine)
atan (Arc tangent)
atan2 (Arc tangent of two variables)
ceil (Round up)
floor (Round down)
exp (e to the power of n)
log (Natural logarithm)
max (Greater of two values)
min (Smaller of two values)
random (Random number from 0 to less than 1)
pow (Power)
round (Rounding to integer)
sin (Sine)
cos (Cosine)
tan (Tangent)
sqrt (Square root)

Implemented properties:
E (e)
LN10 (log(10))
LN2 (log(2))
LOG10E (Logarithm of e base 10)
LOG2E (Logarithm of e base 2)
PI (Ï€)
SQRT1_2 (sqrt(1/2))
SQRT2 (sqrt(2))
